name: Violet Cycle
description: Hyperkinetic neopoly roguecade action game with procedural generation at its core. Order within chaos. Feeling inside polygons!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP SP2+ or higher Processor: Intel Core i3-330M 2.13 GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5650 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
